com.aislab.accesscontrol.core.ui.controller

Class PolicySetController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.aislab.accesscontrol.core.ui.controller.PolicySetController

  • public class PolicySetController
extends java.lang.Object
    A session scoped, managed bean for user interfaces related to PolicySet.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Muhammad Sadiq Alvi <10besemalvi@seecs.edu.pk>, Arjumand Fatima <09bicseafatima@seecs.edu.pk>

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.String addPolicySet()
      Opens the /Policy Creation/Policy Set/Add/addNewPolicySet.xhtml file in a Primefaces Dialog component which offers the functionality of adding a new PolicySet instance.
      void cancelUpdatePolicySet()
      Cancels the operation of updating an existing PolicySet instance.
      void deleteSubPolicies()
      Deletes an instance of Policy stored in selectedSubPolicy property
      void deleteSubPolicySet()
      Deletes an instance of PolicySet stored in selectedSubPolicySet property
      void deleteTarget()
      Deletes an instance of Target corresponding to an instance of PolicySet specified by the selectedPolicySet property.
      void deleteThisPolicySet()
      Deletes the instance of Action stored in selectedPolicySet property
